name: NeuroPoker
description:
Try your best to memorize all the cards and get a higher score!

Team Members: Wenkang Su, Vera Li

Rule:

Press "Play" to Start, then you will be given 20 seconds to memorize all the pokers.

After 20 seconds, all the cards will be flipped. You can select a card, choose the suit & the number for that card, and click "Confirm". If you are correct, you will gain 10 points. If you have more than 3 correct ones, the score will be multiplied by 1.5. Then times 2 if you have more than 5 correct guesses. More than 7 the score will be multiplied by 3. More than 9 the score will be multiplied by 4 and this can be quite difficult to achieve. 

But if you get one wrong, your score will be dropped to 0 and the game is over.

Once you are done with this round, press "Reset" to restart.
